english.segment1: Papa, I think I messed up again. Was it something I did?. Was it something I said?. I don't mean to do you wrong. It's just the way of human nature!
english.segment2: Sister, I know I let you down. I can tell by the fact. You never come around. You don't have to say a thing. I can tell by your eyes. Exactly what you mean
english.segment3: That it's time. To get down on my knees and pray. "Lord, undo me!". Put away my flesh and bone. 'Til You own this spirit through me Lord, Undo me.
english.segment4: Mama, I know I made you cry. But I never meant to hurt you. I never meant to lie. While the world shook its head in shame. I let you take the blame
english.segment5: Brother, I know you labored. So hard to please. But I cut you down. And I left you on your knees. Well I know it must be
english.segment6: Time to get down on my knees and pray. "Lord, undo me!". Put away my flesh and bone. 'Til You own this spirit through me Lord
english.segment7: I am wanting, needing, guilty and greedy. Unrighteous, unholy; undo me. Undo me!
english.segment8: Abba Father You must wonder why. More times than Peter I have denied. Three nails and a cross to prove. I owe my life eternally to you!
english.segment9: And it's time. To get down on my knees and pray. "Lord, undo me!". Put away my flesh and bone. 'Til You own this spirit through me Lord, Undo me
